feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 5:28AM AKST until December 14 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY SNOW EVENT FOR THE HAINES AND KLONDIKE HIGHWAYS THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT... .A wave of moisture moving through the northern panhandle will bring moderate to heavy snow for the Haines and Klondike Highways. A period of snow near sea level for Haines and Skagway will last through Thursday morning.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway

entry.title: Winter Storm Watch issued December 14 at 4:40AM AKST until December 15 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Near blizzard conditions possible. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 10:28PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STORM FORCE FRONT MOVES IN WEDNESDAY NIGHT INTO THURSDAY NIGHT... The second in a series of strong fronts moves over the AK Gulf then into the Panhandle Wednesday night into Thursday night. While this fast moving system will bring in periods of heavy precipitation and strong winds, it is not expected to be as severe
entry.cap:areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; City and Borough of Yakutat; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 2:46AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...INCREASED FIRE DANGER IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EST THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON ACROSS NORTHEAST GEORGIA... Relative humidity values are expected to drop below 25 percent across northeast Georgia this afternoon. With dry fuels, increased fire danger conditions can be expected. Please refer to your local burn permitting authorities on whether
entry.cap:areaDesc: Elbert; Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Rabun; Stephens

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 2:29AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH FIRE DANGER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON INTO THE EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTH AND NORTH CENTRAL GEORGIA DUE TO LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES... Relative Humidities of 25 percent or less can be expected for 4 or more hours this afternoon into the evening. Winds will be northeast at 8 to 12 mph, with gusts to 20 mph possible.
